content.query:
-- TOP 100
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsopenclassanalytics.dfs.core.windows.net/std/Cornerchy/Sales/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]

-- COUNT
SELECT COUNT(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsopenclassanalytics.dfs.core.windows.net/std/Cornerchy/Sales/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


-- COUNT
SELECT [Date], COUNT(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsopenclassanalytics.dfs.core.windows.net/std/Cornerchy/Sales/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
group by [Date]
order by [Date] desc
